DOC.brief_summary: Examine the efficacy of parent interventions to prevent college student drinking in first year students.
DOC.brief_title: Parent Interventions to Prevent Student Drinking
DOC.detailed_description: The aims of the study are to: 1. efficacy of parent interventions to prevent college student drinking in first year students; 2. examine mediators of efficacy; and 3. examine moderators of efficacy.
